name: Narona
description:
Narona is a game set in an abandoned town in the middle of a forest. The player starts in a house and there is a note. From that moment, you will have to find all the notes and pages of a girl's diary and investigate about what happened to Narona.

In the game you can see how many notes you have recolected and how many are left. It is difficult to find all the notes since the map is big, so if you want to read the story you can spoil yourself in the main screen clicking on the See all notes option.
